gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Raptors 114, Hornets 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Raptors defeated the Hornets, 114-99.  Pascal Siakam led the way with 27 points, eight rebounds and eight assists for the Raptors, while Scottie Barnes (22 points, 17 rebounds, seven assists) and Gary Trent Jr. (22 points, 10 rebounds, four 3PM) combined for 44 in the victory.  Terry Rozier tallied 22 points and seven assists for the Hornets in the losing effort.  The Raptors improve to 11-15 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 7-18.
